Reviews.Title: More than i expected
Reviews.Author: Yesinel
Reviews.Content: the computer is really amazing i recommend it, Photoshop is really fast, its good for gaming so far i played Unreal TournamentII,starcraff,Rise of nations, saints row 3, Fifa13, Online game: Aion and ragnarock II,so far im loving this laptop

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Idan
Reviews.Content: I received this two or three days ago and I am completely satisfied with it. You would never know it is a refurb, and this is presumably because it is a hp-certified refurb. I started using windows 8 with an open mind, as I have heard from many people that it is bad but it is completely fine in my opinion. The only downside was that I was experienced and did not realise that electronic goods require you to pay customs duty. It was still a good deal but less so because of the unexpected charge. This was my own fault for not realising, but hopefully others may benefit from reading this.

Reviews.Title: Refurb Laptop
Reviews.Author: Randolph Bass
Reviews.Content: This Laptop was refurbished so i was sceptical but not any more, it works great and has more features than i expected, the model number seems like a 15.6 screen but its a 17in screen and it is touch screen.
